mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.year,s.region_id,s.id,group_concat(distinct p.name) as name from product p join section s on p.id=s.product_id where s.year=#{year} and s.region_id=(select id from region r where name=#{regionName}) group by p.name

select elecontent as maxcontent,p.name as nameOfmax from product_element pe join product p on pe.product_id=p.id join section s on p.id=s.product_id
where s.year=#{year} and pe.element_id=#{eleid} and s.region_id=(select id from region r where name=#{regionName}) order by elecontent+0 desc limit 1

select elecontent as mincontent,p.name as nameOfmin from product_element pe join product p on pe.product_id=p.id join section s on p.id=s.product_id
where s.year=#{year} and pe.element_id=#{eleid} and s.region_id=(select id from region r where name=#{regionName}) order by elecontent+0 asc limit 1

select avg(pe.elecontent+0) as avgcontent from product_element pe join product p on pe.product_id=p.id join section s on p.id=s.product_id where s.`year`=#{year} and pe.element_id=#{eleid} and s.region_id=(select id from region r where `name`=#{regionName})
select sectionNumber,Cproduct,ElemCd,ElemHg,ElemAs,ElemCu,ElemPb,ElemCr,ElemZn,ElemNi from productInfo where year=#{year} and name=#{regionName}
